net.viktorc.detroid.framework.engine

Class EndGameTableBase

  • Object
    • EndGameTableBase
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    GaviotaTableBaseJNI

    public abstract class EndGameTableBase
extends Object
implements Closeable
    An abstract class for chess endgame tablebases. As there is no Java EGTB, it assumes the probing library to be a native shared library.
    Author:
    Viktor

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  EndGameTableBase.DTM
      A class containing the outcome of a position in an endgame tablebase and potentially the distance to mate from the position.
      static class  EndGameTableBase.EGTBStats
      A simple container class for basic endgame tablebase probing stats.
      static class  EndGameTableBase.WDL
      A simple enum for possible outcomes for positions in endgame tablebases.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int MAX_NUMBER_OF_PIECES
      The maximum number of pieces on the board for which there are endgame tablebases.

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      EndGameTableBase()

      Loads the probing library at the given path.
      abstract EndGameTableBase.DTM probeDTM(Position pos, boolean soft)
      It probes for the given position and if found, it returns whether it is a win, loss, or draw; and in case it is a win or loss, it also returns the distance to mate.
      abstract EndGameTableBase.WDL probeWDL(Position pos, boolean soft)
      It probes for the given position and if found, it returns whether it is a winning position, a losing position, or a draw; else it returns null.

    • Method Detail

      • loadProbingLibrary

        public void loadProbingLibrary(String path)
        Loads the probing library at the given path.
        Parameters:
        path - The path to the shared library containing the probing code.

      • isProbingLibLoaded

        public boolean isProbingLibLoaded()
        Whether the last call to loadProbingLibrary(String) resulted in the successful loading of the library.
        Returns:
        Whether the last library loading attempt has been successful.

      • init

        public abstract void init(String path,
                          long cacheSize,
                          Object... args)
        Initializes the probing code, potentially including the setting up of the cache.
        Parameters:
        path - The path to the folders containing the endgame tablebase files.
        cacheSize - The size of the probing cache in bytes.
        args - Optional arguments.

      • isInit

        public abstract boolean isInit()
        Returns whether the probing code has been initialized.
        Returns:
        Whether the probing code has been initialized.

      • clearCache

        public abstract void clearCache()
        Flushes the probing cache.

      • areTableBasesAvailable

        public abstract boolean areTableBasesAvailable(int piecesOnBoard)
        It returns whether there are at least some tablebase files loaded for positions with the given number of pieces on the board.
        Parameters:
        piecesOnBoard - The total number of pieces on the board.
        Returns:
        If there are tablebases loaded for the specified number of men on the board.

      • getStats

        public abstract EndGameTableBase.EGTBStats getStats()
        Returns some basic usage stats about the endgame tablebase.
        Returns:
        Endgame tablebase stats.

      • resetStats

        public abstract void resetStats()
        Resets the endgame tablebase stats.

      • probeWDL

        public abstract EndGameTableBase.WDL probeWDL(Position pos,
                                              boolean soft)
        It probes for the given position and if found, it returns whether it is a winning position, a losing position, or a draw; else it returns null.
        Parameters:
        pos - The chess position to look for.
        soft - Whether only the cache should be probed.
        Returns:
        Whether it is a winning position, a losing position, or a draw.

      • probeDTM

        public abstract EndGameTableBase.DTM probeDTM(Position pos,
                                              boolean soft)
        It probes for the given position and if found, it returns whether it is a win, loss, or draw; and in case it is a win or loss, it also returns the distance to mate. If the position is not found, it returns null.
        Parameters:
        pos - The chess position to look for.
        soft - Whether only the cache should be probed.
        Returns:
        Whether it is a win, loss, or draw; and potentially the distance to mate.
